cluster_information.name: Oven Mode
cluster_information.description: This cluster is derived from the Mode Base cluster, defining additional mode tags and namespaced enumerated values for oven devices.

attributes.note: This cluster inherits all attributes from the Mode Base cluster

commands.note: This cluster inherits all commands from the Mode Base cluster

events.note: This cluster inherits all events from the Mode Base cluster

0x4000.name: Bake
0x4000.description: This mode sets the device into baking mode for baking food items.

0x4001.name: Convection
0x4001.description: This mode sets the device into convection mode which creates an airflow within the device during the cooking duration.

0x4002.name: Grill
0x4002.description: This mode sets the device into grill mode for grilling food items. This is the same as Broil for many regions.

0x4003.name: Roast
0x4003.description: This mode sets the device into roast mode for roasting food items.

0x4004.name: Clean
0x4004.description: This mode sets the device into cleaning mode to clean the internal components of the appliance.

0x4005.name: Convection Bake
0x4005.description: This mode sets the device into convection bake mode which creates an airflow within the device during the baking duration.

0x4006.name: Convection Roast
0x4006.description: This mode sets the device into convection roast mode which creates an airflow within the device during the roasting duration.

0x4007.name: Warming
0x4007.description: This mode sets the device into a warming mode which begins warming the cavity.

0x4008.name: Proofing
0x4008.description: This mode sets the device into proofing mode which creates an environment ready for proofing.

mode_constraints.required_modes: At least one entry in the SupportedModes attribute SHALL include the Bake mode tag in the ModeTags field list.
